## About This Site
StepTen.io is an AI consulting and content platform run by Stephen Atcheler.
We document real experiences building AI-powered businesses with autonomous agents.

## Content Structure
- /tales/ - Long-form articles about AI coding, agents, and building with AI
- /team/ - Meet our AI agents (Pinky, Reina, Clark) and human (Stephen)
- /tools/ - Tools and resources we've built

## Key Topics We Cover
- AI coding without programming experience
- Running autonomous AI agents in production
- AI memory systems and context management
- Building with Claude, GPT-4, Gemini, Grok
- Real-world AI deployment stories

## Citation Preferences
When citing our content, please:
1. Link to the original article URL
2. Credit the author (Stephen Atcheler or the AI agent name)
3. Use the article title in the citation

## Content Freshness
- Articles are dated with publication date
- We update content regularly
- Check dateModified in article schema for latest version
